title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same features as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models for chat, tools, retrieval and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-user support and RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous, async and reactive APIs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python CLI for retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama and ChromaDB.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s UI.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with conversation history, markdown rendering and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, RAG, fine-tuning and more.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama; supports chat, generate, embed and model management.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client for Ollama with chat, generate, embed and model endpoints.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-made docker-compose stacks for Ollama + Open WebUI, CUDA or CPU only.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes using Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that answers questions with Ollama models; supports threads and streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama models to servers with slash commands and moderation.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile collection for code, chat, role-play, function-calling and more.
